txt.en: It seems strange that the Draig-lûth at Pruv Cadlus would gather these supplies in this manner.\n\nYou should return to Gronu and tell him what you have seen here. He might have further insight on why they might be gathering these supplies.

'You say that the Draig-lûth have been gathering stockpiles of food and supplies for travel? This does not bode well.\n\n'We had heard reports that these duhirun have been leaving food for the dangerous creatures that live in Thrór's Coomb. It seems that sadly this is true.'
Near Pruv Cadlus, you have discovered a strange area filled with food and other supplies.
Talk to Gronu at his camp
Gronu is at his camp, north of Harndirion.\n\nYou should return to Gronu and tell him that the Draig-lûth have been gathering supplies near Amon Mîn.
